abstract.t: This memo defines a [XML] Document Type Definition (DTD) thatcorresponds to the iCalendar, Internet Calendaring and SchedulingCore Object Specification defined by [RFC 2445]. This DTD providesequivalent functionality to the standard format defined by [RFC2445]. Documents structured in accordance with this DTD may also beknown as 'XML iCalendar' documents or 'xCal'.
